jd: Hi,My name is Prashant Raj and I am a Staffing Specialist at Intellectt Inc. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our clients.Business Analyst (Capital market / Financial Domain experience)6+ Month Contract RoleOnsite RoleNew York, NY RATE IS $50/HR ON C2C Please share only profiles that have not been submitted to HCL in the past 4 monthsSkill SetOverall 10+ Experience5+ years of experience in Requirement Gathering and Elaboration session with the Financial CustomersHands on Experience in Engaging in customer discussion to understand the business requirementsExperience in Capital market domain- especially trading, listing of securities, regulatory aspects of capital market - like compliance and reporting can be added to the listActivitiesParticipate in requirement gathering and Process/User Journey design thinking workshops.Forecast and suggest the Future Roadmap and Functional scalability for RequirementManage functional product backlog and supports in maintaining functional designs.Creating, Managing User stories and validating development & test scenarios.Organize Show and tell sessions to business,Knowledge transfer to development and testing team.
